config.title: New Entry Distance In Lines
config.description:
If the cursor moves at least this many lines away (while moving within a file), a new history entry will be made. Using a value < 2 may break things. 

'2' is the author's ideal value, but you may wish to increase this value to reduce the number of history entries that are created for a single file.

Note that the commands 'Navigate Forward/Back 1 File' make these extra entries easy to ignore when stepping through your history.

Default value: 2

config.title: History Size
config.description:
How many history entries should be saved in memory at once. A number that isn't obscenely high is probably best.

Suggested value:100

config.title: Log Debug Messages
config.description: If enabled, messages about activity should start appearing in the Extension Console.

config.title: Auto Reveal Focused Index
config.description: When a new entry is added to the sidebar, enabling this will have scroll the sidebar to this index. Turning this off may be more optimal.
